text:
@GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump None of anyone I spoke to has benefited from the new income tax structure.  In fact, many cannot take any of their usual deductions. 
I don’t know about you, but my neighborhood has been devastated by income lost due to Coronavirus.   How is this winning economically?
